titles.title: Make Student Grants Truly Tax-Free Act
A bill to amend section 117 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude Federal student aid from taxable gross income.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/16/2014--Introduced. Make Student Grants Truly Tax-Free Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the tax exclusion for scholarships to include amounts received: (1) through a scholarship or fellowship grant program administered by the Secretary of Education that is based on financial need, including a Federal Pell Grant, and (2) as an Iraq and Afghanistan Service grant under the Higher Education Act of 1965.
